recipe.name: Chocolate Gateau
recipe.description: A rich and moist chocolate cake, perfect for dessert or special occasions.
steps: Grease and line the base of an 8-inch round springform cake tin with baking parchment.
Break the chocolate into a heatproof bowl and place over a saucepan of gently simmering water, stirring until it melts. Alternatively, melt in the microwave for 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Place the butter and sugar in a mixing bowl and cream together with a wooden spoon until light and fluffy.
Gradually beat in the eggs, adding a little flour if the mixture begins to curdle.
Fold in the remaining flour along with the cooled, melted chocolate and milk. Mix until smooth.
Spread the mixture into the prepared cake tin and bake for 50-55 minutes, or until firm in the center and a skewer inserted comes out clean.
Cool for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack and cool completely.
Bon appétit! Your masterpiece is ready to be enjoyed.
